post.text:
保研边缘的同学可以康康这个，至少可以当个保底选项：香港科技大学广州校园杜娟老师招收博士生，详情：Dr. Juan Du’s research group at HKUST(GZ) is seeking talented and self-motivated PhD students to join her research group. Applicants from top universities with a background in Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Automation, Applied Statistics, Machine Learning, or a related field are encouraged to apply. The interested applicants can send your information (e.g. CV, transcripts, and/or TOEFL/IELTS scores) to juandu@ust.hk. More details about Dr. Juan Du can be found in
https://www.mae.hkust.edu.hk/en/people/faculty/detail/du-juan 
More details about admission can be found in 
https://hkust-gz.edu.cn/admission
